{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine which statement about gutta-percha is not true, we need to evaluate each statement individually. 

A. It contains 60-70% gutta-percha and 20% ZnO: This statement is true. Gutta-percha is a polymer of isoprene and does not contain ZnO. 

B. Can be sterilized by heating: This statement is true. Gutta-percha can be sterilized by heating. 

C. With time they become brittle: This statement is true. Over time, gutta-percha can become brittle and lose its flexibility. 

D. It has two forms α and β: This statement is true. Gutta-percha has two forms, α and β. 

Based on the evaluation of each statement, it appears that all statements are true. Therefore, the answer is None of the above.", "answer_choice": "None of the above"}
